In this section, we are going to show how to use Galaxy tools. We will use the `fastqc` and the `trmmomatic` tools to do some short reads quality control analysis.

We will perform quality control on a set of single end reads and paired end reads. We will learn how to build **datasets collections** and paired **datasets collections**.
